definitions.text: a thoroughfare (usually including sidewalks) that is lined with buildings
examples: they walked the streets of the small town

definitions.text: the part of a thoroughfare between the sidewalks; the part of the thoroughfare on which vehicles travel
the streets of a city viewed as a depressed environment in which there is poverty and crime and prostitution and dereliction
examples: she tried to keep her children off the street
he worked both sides of the street

definitions.text: people living or working on the same street
examples: the whole street protested the absence of street lights
